item.title: When And How to Use Database Transactions in Laravel
item.description: Hello Artisan ðŸ˜Ž , Database transactions are often an overlooked feature, but Laravel makes it so effortless. One of the powerful ways to ensure data integrity is database transactions. Database transactions give a powerful ability to safely perform multiple database queries in a single transaction. If all queries run smoothly, then only it will commit otherwise it will roll back. For Example, we have an application where we create a user, assign a role to the created user, and add KYC (Know your customer).
